body_html:
Hi @yzhwang & @KillPinguin - we've been noticing the same issues. We have been running on Volta cards (a V100 and a Titan V) and see no performance improvement with FP 16. Happy to provide benchmarking code, etc.

We were wondering if you had any new thoughts or advice on this? Thanks in advance.

body:
Hi @yzhwang & @KillPinguin - we've been noticing the same issues. We have been running on Volta cards (a V100 and a Titan V) and see no performance improvement with FP 16. Happy to provide benchmarking code, etc.

We were wondering if you had any new thoughts or advice on this? Thanks in advance.
